```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(DT)

options(DT.options = list(pageLength = 25, scrollX = TRUE))

# IMPORTANT: use a *relative* path inside your repo, not C:/...

excel_file <- "data/public_procurement_data_dictionary.xlsx"
sheets <- excel_sheets(excel_file)
```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
for (s in sheets) {

# Section title

cat("## ", s, "\n\n")

# Read sheet

df <- read_excel(excel_file, sheet = s)

# Interactive table

print(
datatable(
df,
caption = paste("Sheet:", s),
filter = "top"
)
)

cat("\n\n")
}

```
